message.entry: 경계 상자 데이터의 크기는 M×4, M×5 또는 M×9여야 합니다. 여기서 M은 각 테이블 요소의 상자 개수입니다. 경계 상자가 포함된 훈련 데이터 테이블의 열은 셀형 배열이어야 합니다.
Label data must be an M-by-1 categorical array, where M specifies the number of labels in a row. The column in the training data table that contains the labels must be a cell array.
The number of bounding boxes does not equal the number of labels in row {0,number,integer} of the training data table. See boxLabelDatastore for more details.
Multiple tables must be in the same format. See boxLabelDatastore for more details.
입력 테이블 {0}의 {1}열에 있는 데이터가 유효하지 않습니다.
입력 테이블 {0}의 {1}행에 있는 데이터가 유효하지 않습니다.
Invalid bounding boxes found in input table {0}.

The size of all bounding box matrices contained in the input tables must be the same. The size of each matrix must be M-by-4, M-by-5, or M-by-9, where M is the number of boxes in each table element. See boxLabelDatastore for more details.
The maximum image number in the BlockLocations property must not exceed the number of rows ({0}) in the boxLabels table input. See boxLabelDatastore for more details.
The bounding boxes must be M-by-4 or M-by-5 when blockLocationSet is provided as an input. See boxLabelDatastore for more details.
Invalid BlockOrigin in the blockLocationSet input. n-D BlockOrigin values in the blockLocationSet are not supported in boxLabelDatastore.
